page.info.title: Xp Storage Info
handbook.main.text: XP Obelisk Mod introduces a method to store experience points inside a spiritual cage. Normally the XP points will only linger around the ground for a minute then disappear forever or get destroyed when the player die's. With XP Obelisk, players’ can store as much XP as they like.
page.text.xp_berries: XP Berries can be used on XP Storage to insert some Experience
page.text.bottle_o_enchant: Use a Empty Bottle on XP Storage to fill it or Emptying on the XP Storage.
item.tooltip.inspector: Use on XP Storage to inspect it.
item.tooltip.xp_rod: Use on XP Storage to receive level.
item.tooltip.xp_remover: Use on XP Storage to store level.
item.tooltip.xp_berrie_sneak: Sneak eat to drop XP on ground
item.tooltip.lock: Use on XP Storage to lock it.
item.tooltip.key: Use on XP Storage to unlock it.
xps.advancements.xp_obelisk.title: Storage To Infinity
